---
title: "Analysis Using Gapminder Dataset"
---

This dataset includes 142 countries and for each country, there are values for life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population, every five years, from 1952 to 2007.

You can find a description of the dataset here: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/gapminder/index.html
